thread.title: Spotted: Chelsea boss Antonio Conte's hilarious reaction as Mignolet saves Costa penalty
thread.title_full: Spotted: Chelsea boss Antonio Conte's hilarious reaction as Mignolet saves Costa penalty

title: Spotted: Chelsea boss Antonio Conte's hilarious reaction as Mignolet saves Costa penalty
text:
1 of 15 Antonio Conte couldn't hide his emotions after Diego Costa's penalty miss 
David Luiz scored a cheeky free-kick to give the Blues a lead at Anfield, before Georginio Wijnaldum equalised with a firm second-half header to earn a draw for the home side . 
Costa had a chance to steal all three points for Chelsea after winning a penalty under Joel Matip's challenge, but the Spaniard couldn't find a way past Simon Mignolet. 
Scroll through the gallery above to see how Antonio Conte reacted after Costa squandered a golden opportunity from 12 yards. Related articles
